title: Software Engineer at Volkswagen AG
summary: I'm a software developer with almost 3 years of experience. I was working at Fraunhofer FIT as a Fullstack Software Engineer using using Node.JS and Java for creating web applications for patients and libraries to handle sensor data. Moreover, I was studying Computer Science (MSc) in the University of Bonn and doing thesis about an integration of heterogeneous databases for polypharmacy optimization using different modeling SQL and NoSQL approaches (MySQL, Cassandra and MongoDB). During my studies I was taking subjects from Information and Communication Management and Intelligent Systems tracks.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: EAM system is the application software for company's fund management. It is designed to automate the recording of business processes, fund maintenance and repair. EAM-system will allow Tomskgazprom Company to maintain databases and keep track of the technical condition of the equipment in the fields. The company can automatically plan and calculate the cost of all repairs, take into account the actual cost of repairs, keep track of the shift of materials and spare parts from one warehouse to another, as well as, analyze the results of equipment operation. Technologies: (.NET stack, WPF, MVVM light, EF, Telerik, Telerik Open Acess, MSSQL)

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Project 1: Created data web-monitoring system for various complex physical experiments (KATRIN and KITCUBE) using web technologies. Django framework + Backbone.JS were used to implement REST architectural design. (Django, Django REST Framework, Python, Javascript, Require.JS, Backbone.JS, Highcharts.JS) Project 2: Created module for authentication and authorization for system called ADEI (Advanced Data Extraction Infrastracture). ADEI is AJAX based dynamic web interface facilitating browsing and extraction time-series from various data sources. (PHP, XSLT)
